description:
The Six-Tailed Slug (六尾の蛞蝓, Rokubi no Namekuji) is a tailed beast sealed within http://anidb.net/ch14668 [Utakata] of Kirigakure. It has been captured by http://anidb.net/ch12003 [Nagato] in the anime, then extracted and sealed by http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki].
[Taken from Narutowikia]
name: Saiken
